keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject

byline.contributor: Matthew Rosenberg and Gardiner Harris contributed reporting from Washington.

lead_paragraph: The Maryland base was planning an “active shooter exercise.” Then things became confusing.

headline.print_headline: Base Locked Down After Mistaken Report of Gunman
headline.main: Joint Base Andrews Locked Down After Unfounded Gunman Report

snippet: The Maryland base was planning an “active shooter exercise.” Then things became confusing....
abstract: Joint Base Andrews, Maryland military base and home of Air Force One, is placed on lockdown for over hour due to false reports of active shooter; drill to train for active shooter situation may have led to misunderstanding.
